text: Peristernia australiensis is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Fasciolariidae, the spindle snails, the tulip snails and their allies. ==Distribution== ==Description== ==Ecology== Parasites of Peristernia australiensis include trematode Lobatostoma manteri. ==References== ==External links== Category:Fasciolariidae Category:Gastropods described in 1847
title: Peristernia australiensis
